Description: Ostracon, fragment of the shoulder of a pale-red pottery vessel, the fabric is grey in section, the exterior is covered with a cream and buff-coloured slip and faint traces of a red-painted Coptic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394132) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394132)
